original_text: This was the message: ‘Even though you were not an important person, I made you the leader of my people, the Israelites. But then you did all the bad things that Jeroboam did! Also, you caused my people the Israelites to do bad things. Their sins have caused me to become very angry.
korean_text: 내가 너를 티끌에서 들어 내 백성 이스라엘 위에 주권자가 되게 하였거늘 네가 여로보암의 길로 행하며 내 백성 이스라엘에게 범죄하게 하여 그들의 죄로 나를 노엽게 하였은즉

sentences.original_text: Even though you were not an important person
I made you the leader of my people
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 당신을 내 백성의 지도자로 삼았습니다

sentences.original_text: But then you did all the bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 당신은 모든 나쁜 일들을 행했습니다

sentences.original_text: Also, you caused my people the Israelites
sentences.korean_translation: 또한, 당신은 내 백성 이스라엘 사람들이

sentences.original_text: Their sins have caused me to become very angry
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 죄가 나로 하여금 매우 분노하게 만들었습니다
